title: New service FlexiRide is coming to Rowville
articleContent:
From Monday 14 December 2020 Telebus in Rowville will be replaced with FlexiRide, a new on demand bus service that operates only when booked with no fixed route. FlexiRide will operate between Rowville and Ferntree Gully, an extension to the area previously serviced by Telebus 7, 8 and 9. Passengers can book a trip from their nearest stop to or from Stud Park Shopping Centre or Ferntree Gully Train Station.

FlexiRide services will run Monday to Friday from 6am - 8pm. You can book up to seven days in advance. Services do not run on weekends or public holidays.

To find your nearest stop location or book FlexiRide, call (03) 8710 6377 between 5am – 7.30pm or download the FlexiRide App from 7 December via Google Play or Apple App Store. Bookings via the App can be updated or cancelled at any time.

Passengers with accessibility requirements can request a more tailored service that picks them up from their door or an agreed accessible location. Please let us know if you have accessibility needs when making a booking.

FlexiRide is a new bus initiative being trialled by the Department of Transport. The service will be evaluated at the end of the trial.

For more information about FlexiRide or how to use the service, you can contact 1800 800 007.
